3 WEEKS IN PARADISE

by Bootlegger

Released Sep 13, 2003
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Based on a classic ZX Spectrum game from the 80's. This is a puzzle game. It requires some strange thinking to complete some of the puzzles. The idea is to utilise the scattered objects in certain ways with other objects and/or with scenery. As you complete parts of the puzzle, other items may appear or you may complete partof the puzzle. You need to complete 100% of the puzzles to free your wife (wilma) and son (herbert)and escape the island.
